I am currently the Senior Baseball Writer at RealGM, where I cover all aspects of the MLB and other sports on occasion. My writing here includes reviews of team transactions, longform articles and general analysis. The site's main focus is on providing statistical analytics to professional sports teams in the United States, especially the NBA. RealGM wanted to grow their involvement among sports consumers, however, which is where I come in. I write articles to drive up interest among fans, both casual and serious. A full list of articles I have written is available on their website, but I've included some favorite pieces below.

  • ● The Morning After: On the Houston Astros' World Series Win
  • ● Play Ball... Please?: On the MLB Collective Bargaining Agreement
  • ● Qualified To Play Ball: Where Do We Go Now?
  • ● A Treatise on the Omnipotence of God (of the KBO)
  • ● A (Relatively) Simple Summary of the Shohei Otani Situation
  • ● A Love Letter (of Sorts) to the San Jose Sharks
